name: Antivirus Exploitation Framework Detection
description: Detects a highly relevant Antivirus alert that reports an exploitation framework
pattern:
title: Antivirus Exploitation Framework Detection
id: 238527ad-3c2c-4e4f-a1f6-92fd63adb864
description: Detects a highly relevant Antivirus alert that reports an exploitation framework
date: 2018/09/09
modified: 2019/01/16
author: Florian Roth
references:
    - https://www.nextron-systems.com/2018/09/08/antivirus-event-analysis-cheat-sheet-v1-4/
tags:
    - attack.execution
    - attack.t1203
    - attack.command_and_control
    - attack.t1219
logsource:
    product: antivirus
detection:
    selection:
        Signature: 
            - "*MeteTool*"
            - "*MPreter*"
            - "*Meterpreter*"
            - "*Metasploit*"
            - "*PowerSploit*"
            - "*CobaltSrike*"
            - "*Swrort*"
            - "*Rozena*"
            - "*Backdoor.Cobalt*"
    condition: selection
fields:
    - FileName
    - User
falsepositives:
    - Unlikely
level: critical
